# stackView(_:willDetach:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the stack view is about to automatically detach one or more of its views.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func stackView(_ stackView: NSStackView, willDetach views: [NSView])
```

## Parameters

- **stackView**: The stack view that is about to detach one or more of its views.
- **views**: An array of one or more views, managed by the stack view, that are about to be automatically detached.

## Discussion

To configure a custom class to respond to the automatic detachment of views from a stack view’s view hierarchy, implement this method in the class. This method is not called when your code explicitly removes a view from a stack view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStackView/views] array.

## Responding to View Detachment and Reattachment

- **stackView(_:didReattach:)**: Called when the stack view has automatically reattached one or more previously-detached views.
